GeoPITS: Let the Experts Deal with DBA

Thirunavukkarasu RM

Founder

The current IT landscape is clearly throwing light on the shift that the enterprises are undergoing to embrace the benefit of cloud computing accessibility to scale, increased agility, and diversity of data, lowered TCO and more. Microsoft has found major market share amongst such businesses. However, the implementation, management and maintenance become tricky, which calls for end-to-end support solutions. Bengaluru based Geo Platinum IT Services (GeoPITS) is a startup providing enterprise level support and solutions focusing on requirements in the Microsoft data platform.

As a certified Microsoft Silver Partner, GeoPITS focuses on a broad range of SQL Server solutions for diverse set of organizations across the globe with a sole objective of empowering their market grip and magnifying their impact. The firm’s array of services include on-premise database support, database management in cloud, SQL Server Integration Services, Reporting Services(SSRS), PowerBI, Azure data factory and MS Enterprise Data Warehouse solutions. Most importantly, GeoPITS is an established group of certified DBA experts with rich experience, ETL programmers, reporting experts and data modelers under one roof. This group of domain veterans helps to provide flexible and scalable solutions customized to business needs. By putting together a proven delivery model and
cost effective DBA services, GeoPITS allows its clients to focus on their core competency. Meanwhile, GeoPITS focuses on the operational support and needs of the SQL Server database environment.

By putting together a proven delivery model and cost effective DBA services, GeoPITS allows its clients to focus on their core competency


Ever since its inception in 2017, GeoPITS has set benchmarks with significant offerings thereby taking a vantage point in the market for IT support solutions. This start up is one of the few companies in India who dedicatedly support clients on Microsoft Data Platform. “We believe this is our core strength because this focus has helped us effectively provide expert solutions for all kinds of SQL Server needs”, adds Thirunavukkarasu RM, Founder, GeoPITS. Deployment of inhouse monitoring systems to clients for pro active monitoring, proven track record of improving performance by upto 10x for a number of clients, providing customized business model with affordable solutions for both the short and long term, availing on site or remote assignments which suits any business right from a startup to enterprise businesses these are few of the key deliverables that GeoPITS takes prides of and enjoys the exclusivity for. The company also avails cost effective DBA coverage saving upto 70 percent of additional inhouse staff for businesses. GeoPITS acts as the extended DBA support team thereby ensuring faster turnaround time and quicker resolutions.

GeoPITS is currently working on SQL Server solutions for 45+ clients across the globe. Few prominent clients include HyperOffice, OfficeDrive, Landmark Group, TVS Motors, Softenger, Data Patrol, Wipro, Rapyder, Flexera, and MResult to name a few. Particularly, GeoPITS has been handling 600+ databases for more than 20 clients across the globe. Working with India’s leading motorcycle manufacturing company on Dealer’s service centre management software, this company improved the application performance by 5x resulting in smooth and seamless application performance. Also, GeoPITS worked with a multinational retail conglomerate in automating numerous critical project workflows, thus helping them cut down on their cost and time in the DBA related tasks. The GeoPITS team is working on inhouse DB monitoring software which lets clients monitor their database on the go. This SaaS product will be accompanied by a sophisticated AI powered chatbot integrated with the system. Having achieved such remarkable feats in a short span, it is only a matter of time before GeoPITS becomes a market leader for enterprise support and solutions.
